bullets: Built the MVP from scratch using Next.js and Node.js, enabling the startup to secure $1.5M in seed funding

Delivered 10+ custom web applications for clients in retail and logistics, consistently meeting tight deadlines

Collaborated directly with clients to define technical requirements and provide weekly progress updates
